possible_values: tx_args: Device args to use when connecting to the USRP, type=str
freq: RF center frequency in Hz, type = float
rate : rate of radio block, type = float
tx_gain or rx_gain: gain for the RF chain, type = float
tx_antenna: antenna selection (TX/RX), type = str
tx_bandwidth:analog front-end filter bandwidth in Hz, type = float
tx_waveform_file_name:tdms/mat/... file name, type = str
IEEE802.11ac_FR1_WiFi_FDD_MIMOTX1_BW-20MHz_CC-1_SCS-312.5kHz_Mod-MCS9_OFDM_config (.tdms)
NR_FR1_DL_FDD_SISO_BW-20MHz_CC-1_SCS-30kHz_Mod-64QAM_OFDM_TM3.1(.tdms)
ieee_tx11ac_legacy_20MHz_80MSps_MCS7_27bytes_1frame (mat folder name
tx_reference or rx_reference: reference source (internal, external, gpsdo, type = str
tx_radio_id: radio block to use (e.g., 0 or 1), type = int
tx_radio_chan: radio channel to use, type = int
tx_replay_id:replay block to use (e.g., 0 or 1), type = int
tx_replay_chan: replay channel to use, type = int
tx_duc_chan: duc channel to use, type = int
rx_args: Device args to use when connecting to the USRP, type=str
rx_channels: Channel selection (0,1)
rx_antenna: antenna selection (TX/RX, RX2), type = str
rx-duration: Time duration of IQ data acquisition, type=float
tx_waveform_path:path to TDMS/mat/... file, type = str
tx_waveform_format:possible values: tdms, matlab_ieee, type = str
rx_recorded_data_path: path to store captured rx data, type = str
rx_recorded_data_saving_format: rx recorded data saving format, type = str, possible values (SigMF)
nrecords: number of snapshots from RX IQ data acquisition
rate_source: possoible options (user_defined: given in variations section), (waveform_config: read from waveform config properties)
channel_attenuation: expected channel attenuation, type = float
